songs.title: La Rivalita
songs.lyrics:
Am I the one you see in your so-called nightmares?
Wake up and dance, dance to the beat of the drama
Since beggars can't be choosers, I'll play the victim and you'll play the fool
Tonight this one's going out on popular demand

So hit me back, here's another track you can count on losing
So take that, here's our plan of attack so count on bruising

We are the ones you've named the unaccepted?
Wake up and dance, dance to the beat of the drama
Since liars can be bruisers, you'll play the victim and I'll play the fool
Tonight this one's going out to you on popular demand

So hit me back, here's another track you can count on losing
So take that, here's our plan of attack so count on bruising
(x5)
